summary: Physician Susan D. Rich, M.D., was charged with unprofessional conduct and failing to keep adequate medical records. Allegations included breaching therapeutic boundaries by having a patient live at her home and perform chores, and poor documentation for multiple patients. The disciplinary panel issued a reprimand, a 60-day license suspension, 10 months of probation, a $15,000 civil fine, and mandatory ethics and record-keeping courses.
